pli-tv-bu-vb-sk31:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk31:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjanti abhuñjitukāmā viya …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk31:8.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca asakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
